m_szDocTitle: Are hydrogen fuel cell range-extenders the perfect solution? The French investigate...
m_szDocSumamry: Are hydrogen fuel cell range-extenders the perfect solution? The French investigate… January 30, 2014 | In: Innovation Leave a Comment In the raging battle for future automotive sustainability you’re either pro-hydrogen fuel cell or pro-battery-electric. Honda FCEV or Tesla Model S . Electrolysis or redox. It is a choice, but you cannot – could not ever – be for both. Especially not at the same time. It’s unthinkable. Or is it? An innovative solution has come from an unlikely source, and from early this year a small fleet of electric vans belonging to the iconic French postal service, La Poste
